DOC.criteria: Suspected confirmed NSCLC ( include Stage II ) , individual undergo VATS diagnostic wedge resection accordance institution 's Standard care ( SOC ) ; Scheduled lung resection surgery ( lobectomy wedge resection ) involve one lobe lung ; Performance status 01 ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group classification ) ; ASA score ≤ 3 ; No prior history VATS open lung surgery ; Willing give consent comply studyrelated evaluation treatment schedule ; At least 19 year age . Active ( subject currently receive systemic treatment ) bacterial infection fungal infection ; Systemic administration ( intravenous oral ) steroid , include herbal supplement contain steroid , ( within 30 day prior study procedure ) ; Chemotherapy radiation therapy lung cancer may perform 30 day prior procedure ; Scheduled concurrent surgical procedure wedge resection lobectomy ( central venous access e.g. , port placement , mediastinoscopy lymph node sampling , VATS lymphadenectomy allow ) ; Pregnancy ; Physical psychological condition would impair study participation ; The patient judge unsuitable study participation Investigator reason ; Unable unwilling attend followup visit examination .
